Title: Molecular maps based on broadly learned knowledge-based representations
Description: Molecular representation of small molecules via descriptor-based molecular maps (images). The fingerprint-based molecular maps are available at eos59rr. These images can be used as inputs for an image-based deep learning model such as a convolutional neural network. The authors have demonstrated high performance of MolMap out-of-the-box with a broad range of tasks from MoleculeNet.
Interpretation: Image representation of a molecule. Each pixel represents a molecular feature
